Hi All,

I have an entry in IFComp this year, my first game written in Inform from scratch.

Thanks to KV as awlays for his invaulable help - any errors or bugs in the game are mine!

http://textadventures.co.uk/games/view/byomhgfrf0ylbb_spvqlwa/citizen-of-nowhere

EDIT - Just noticed that it's been categorsied and put on the front page - thanks for that!

All the best,
ND
